item.title: Secure Containers
item.description: Baseline DISABLE ROOT Mount the container’s root filesystem as read-only set k8s Security context set Linux Capabilities Disable privilege escalation securityContext: allowPrivilegeEscalation: false Least Privilege by defining user apiVersion: v1 kind: Pod metadata: name: pod-security spec: securityContext: runAsUser: 10000 runAsGroup: 30000 fsGroup: 20000 Run time Protections SELinux, AppArmor, Auditd, Falco Network policies Container Capabilities capabilities: add: ["NET_ADMIN", "SYS_TIME"] DISABLE ROOT Helpers Versioning
